backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing authorization-gated user profiles, public logging of recruiter visits and visitor messages, public content retrieval, and password‑protected content updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in implementing clear‑log controls for owner panel logs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering hero, resume sections, recruiter prompt, visitor message form, projects, and owner panel based on backend content.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Conte: Owner panel editor allowing password‑gated updates to site content with fields for hero text, skills, hobbies, and project management.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Owner: Password-gated owner panel that unlocks views for recruiter visits, visitor messages, and content editing, with query invalidation on login.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Proje: Provides UI to add, remove, expand, and edit individual projects within the site's editable content.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Recru: Displays recruiter visit logs, supports clearing all logs, and handles loading and authorization states.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Visit: Shows visitor messages sorted by time, with options to clear all and error/loading handling.
Renders the public projects list with expandable detail sections and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/RecruiterPromptM: Prompts users to identify as recruiters and logs recruiter visits before continuing.
frontend/src/components/SecretMessageBox: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/SecretOwnerAcces: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Animated section wrapper that reveals content on scroll using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar that highlights active sections and smooth-scrolls to page anchors.
frontend/src/components/VisitorMessageFo: Contact form component that submits visitor messages and displays a confirmation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook that checks whether the current caller is an admin using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContent.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating editable site content through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hooks for secret message operations, currently returning empty or error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecruiterVisit.ts: Hooks for logging recruiter visits and managing recruiter visit records via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorMessages.ts: Hooks for submitting, retrieving, and clearing visitor messages through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and utility classes for the site theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/resumeContent.ts: Provides structured resume data including hero info, education, multiple experience entries, skills, and certifications.
frontend/src/utils/ownerAccess.ts: Empty file placeholder for owner-access utilities.
frontend/src/utils/ownerPanelAccess.ts: Exports a constant defining the owner panel password.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current spec, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
